title: Two Wolves
description: In 1848, a thin piece of metal about the size of a ladybug altered the history of California. To some, the discovery was a dream come true, but to others, it became a living nightmare. The story of Two Wolves follows the lives of four childhood friends that make the arduous journey through California gold country with dreams of striking it rich. They soon discover that the gold rush wasnâ€™t quite what they expected.
author: Giselle V. Steele
